title: Another: The Other - Inga (Another: The Other)
synopsis: Shortly before the start of a new semester, Misaki Fujioka visits her twin sister Mei Misaki in Yomiyama City. The girls make full use of the last days of summer, roaming around a heat-weary town and visiting various places including a shopping center and shooting stall. When they prowl around her basement, Mei expresses uneasiness about her new class, which is said to be cursed.
staff: [['Iwanami, Yoshikazu', ['Sound Director']], ['Heo, Jong', ['Episode Director']], ['Yoshihara, Masayuki', ['Storyboard']], ['ALI PROJECT', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
